faq.heading: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know to find your perfect specialist
faq.ctaButtonLong: Still have questions? Visit our FAQ page
faq.a1: Bouwmatcher connects homeowners and professionals. Describe your project and receive quotes from carefully selected specialists. You choose the party that best suits your needs, the professional only pays us once you accept their quote. This way the platform remains completely free and transparent for you as a customer.
faq.a2:
1. Fill in your project details and tell us your requirements.
  2. Within 1 to 2 business days you'll receive multiple quotes.
  3. Compare the proposals on price, approach and experience.
  4. Choose the specialist that suits you and start your project.
faq.q3: What does Bouwmatcher cost for me as a customer?
faq.a3: For you as a customer, Bouwmatcher is free. The affiliated professionals only pay us a fee when their quote is actually accepted. This keeps it fair and transparent.
faq.a4: Yes, your data is only shared with the professionals who respond to your request. It is never published publicly.
faq.q5: How do I know if a professional is reliable?
faq.a5: Every professional is checked for Chamber of Commerce registration and any quality marks. In addition, we follow up on feedback from previous customers. Companies with repeated complaints are excluded.
faq.q6: What can I do if I'm not satisfied with the result?
faq.a6: Discuss this first with the professional themselves, often you'll find a solution together. If this doesn't work, contact our team via info@bouwmatcher.com, and we'll help you find an appropriate solution.

hero.description: FAQ for specialists • FAQ for customers

klanten.q1: What does it cost to request a quote?
klanten.a1: At Bouwmatcher, requesting quotes is completely free. Specialists only pay us when their quote is accepted by you. This keeps it transparent and cost-free for you as a customer.
klanten.q2: Why do I sometimes receive fewer than 5 quotes?
klanten.a2: We only select specialists who truly match your project based on location, specialization and availability. Quality comes first – sometimes that's 3, sometimes 5. We prefer few good matches over many bad ones.
klanten.q3: How quickly does a specialist respond?
klanten.a3: On average, you'll receive responses from interested specialists within 24-48 hours. The specialist will contact you directly to schedule an appointment.
klanten.q4: Can I modify my request after submission?
klanten.a4: Yes, contact us via info@bouwmatcher.com or call +32 491 11 59 49. We're happy to help you modify or cancel your request.
klanten.q5: Do I get a warranty on the work?
klanten.a5: Warranty is agreed directly with the specialist. All professionals on our platform are registered with the Chamber of Commerce and often affiliated with trade organizations that offer warranty schemes.
klanten.a6: Don't just look at price, but also at experience, portfolio, reviews and communication. A good match is more important than the lowest price.
klanten.q7: What if I'm not satisfied with the specialist?
klanten.a7: Discuss this directly with the specialist first. If this doesn't lead to a solution, contact our team. We'll work together to find an appropriate solution.
klanten.q8: What if someone doesn't show up or communicates poorly?
klanten.a8: Report this directly to us via info@bouwmatcher.com. We'll contact the specialist and look for an alternative if necessary. Professionals who repeatedly receive complaints are removed from our platform.
klanten.a9: Yes, your data is only shared with the specialists who respond to your request. We comply with GDPR and never share your data with third parties without your permission.

hero.heading: FAQ for
hero.description: FAQ for specialists • FAQ for customers

specialisten.a1: You receive project requests that match your specialization, work area and availability. You choose which requests to respond to.
specialisten.a2: You only pay when your quote is accepted by the customer. The commission is a fixed percentage of the project value. There are no monthly subscription costs.
specialisten.q3: How do I increase my win rate?
specialisten.a3: Complete profiles with portfolio, positive reviews and fast response times significantly increase your chances. Communication and transparency are key.
specialisten.q4: What do I see in a quote request?
specialisten.a4: You see all project details: location, desired execution date, description, any photos and customer contact information.
specialisten.q5: May I add customer data to my own CRM?
specialisten.a5: Yes, once you have contact with a customer via our platform, you may use this data for your own administration and CRM. We only ask that you continue to approach the customer via our platform until the quote is accepted.
specialisten.q6: May I use customer data in my own CRM?
specialisten.a6: Yes, once you have contact with a customer via our platform, you may use this data for your own administration and CRM. We only ask that you continue to approach the customer via our platform until the quote is accepted.
specialisten.a7: Always confirm your appointments in time and remind the customer of the appointment. In case of a customer no-show, report this to our team so we can follow up.
